title: Panel, 4th–5th century
medium:
Medium: Warp; s-spun, teo ply Z-twist. Wefts; S-spun linen, S-spun wool.
Texhnique: slit tapestry with supplementary wrapping and supplementary wefts forming pile.
description: Bands of pile at top and bottom with a band of purple tapestry in the center. selvage at left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, 4th–5th century.
4th–5th century. Medium: Warp; s-spun, teo ply Z-twist. Wefts; S-spun linen, S-spun wool.
Texhnique: slit tapestry with supplementary wrapping and supplementary wefts forming pile.. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-30.
